sources.title: Orazi e Curiazi (1961)
sources.description: A Roman nobleman, Horatius leads an imperial legion during the long and bloody war between the Romans and the Albans.  A desperate arrangement is agreed on how to settle the war.  Three valiant brothers are chosen from each side to fight one last fierce and bloody duel... Watch on RetroFlix:  https://retroflix.org/orazi-e-curiazi-1961/
